com.seanchenxi.gwt.storage.client.serializer
Interface StorageSerializer

public interface StorageSerializer

Interface for deferred binding implementation.

Realize:
Object to String serialization,
String to Object deserialization

Method Detail

deserialize

<T extends Serializable> T deserialize(Class<? super T> clazz,
                                       String serializedString)
                                   throws com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.SerializationException
Deserialize string to object

The clazz only used by serializer to distinguish primitive type and object typ.
For all primitive types, the clazz should equals to .
Otherwise, use Serializable as clazz, and real class type for .

Type Parameters:
T - the real class type wanted to return
Parameters:
clazz - the type of the given value to deserialize with
serializedString - the serialized string which will be deserialize to its original class type
Returns:
the original class type value of the the given string
Throws:
com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.SerializationException

serialize

<T extends Serializable> String serialize(Class<? super T> clazz,
                                          T instance)
                 throws com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.SerializationException
Serialize object to string

The clazz only used to distinguish primitive type and object type.
For all primitive types, the clazz should equals to .
Otherwise, use Serializable as clazz, and real class type for

Type Parameters:
T - the real class type of the given value
Parameters:
clazz - the type of the given value to serialize with
instance - the value which will be serialized to string
Returns:
the serialized string
Throws:
com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.SerializationException
